title: Cowen's Chen: We Are Seeing the Modernization of Macy's (Audio)
itunes:title: Cowen's Chen: We Are Seeing the Modernization of Macy's (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Oliver Chen, Senior Retail Analyst at Cowen and Company, on the big retail earnings today: Macy's, Nordstroms, Kohl's.
